previous.excerpt: About BebeSleep - Free offering of some 60 different pieces of white noise for your baby to enter into sleep - Premium sound sources to restore your baby's healthy sleep pattern - Soundscape from around the globe to develop your baby's hearing ability
previous.title: BebeSleep - BebeSleep is dedicated to helping your baby sleep

localize.description: 关于BebeSleep - 免费提供约60种不同的白噪音，让宝宝进入睡眠状态 - 高级音源，恢复宝宝健康的睡眠模式 - 来自全球各地的音景，开发宝宝的听觉能力。
localize.tagline: BebeSleep致力于帮助您的宝宝睡眠。

localize.description: 關於BebeSleep - 免費提供約60種不同的白噪音，讓寶寶進入睡眠狀態 - 高級音源，恢復寶寶健康的睡眠模式 - 來自全球各地的音景，開發寶寶的聽覺能力。
localize.tagline: BebeSleep致力於幫助您的寶寶睡眠。

next.excerpt: LiveFlow (YC W21) is your first fully automated, NextGen Spreadsheet, that connects real-time data from your Google Sheets, banks, accounting and revenue platforms in a matter of seconds to fully flexible and customizable dashboards.
next.title: LiveFlow - One hub to automate your finances

localize.description: LiveFlow (YC W21)是您的第一个完全自动化的下一代电子表格，它能在几秒钟内将来自Google Sheets、银行、会计和收入平台的实时数据连接到完全灵活和可定制的仪表盘。
localize.tagline: 一个让您的财务自动化的中心

localize.description: LiveFlow (YC W21)是您的第一個完全自動化的下一代電子表格，它能在幾秒鐘內將來自Google Sheets、銀行、會計和收入平臺的實時數據連接到完全靈活和可定製的儀表盤。
localize.tagline: 一個讓您的財務自動化的中心
